replies.body:
Yo LFT! You're a really friendly player in the community and most of the time combo me in public D:< Anyway... questions!

  1. Is there something that happened to you that had no explanation?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. Have you ever been stung by a bee?
  4. What cheers you up?
  5. How do you start a conversation?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Congratulations again on your trial and good luck. Have a good one! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
Hey >> Suh dude
Where do you live? Is it a nice place? >> Florida, and its pretty nice.
Origins of all your IGNs? >> 
SWAG23JorDan (Michael Jordan + #23),
Zoralyth (given to me), 
ItssDreamZ (My Xbox gamertag),
Aged (name changes first came out)
LFT (LFT posts on the forums)
Opinions on Avicus? Avicus or OCN? >> Fun server, like the community and the staff team.
Feelings/reactions when you got Junior mod? How does it feel to be one? Did you ever expect it coming? >> Well, when I was asked to get into teamspeak by seth I was scared but when I was told I was being given a Junior moderator trial I was pretty happy. It feels good to be one, hope to be a full moderator one day. I never expected for me to get accepted by a referral but.. I was fairly confident with my application the last two times applications opened and was confident in making it to the interview when the opened again.
What got you into PvP? How did you find Avicus? What made you stay? >> An 'OP' factions server. I found avicus by a IRL friend from school. Well the community is nice and sweet and I really like all the players on the staff team.
If you could get rid of two things in this world, what would they be? >> Racism & Donald Trump
How old are you? >> 14, turn 15  on 7/24.
Who do you think is going to win the tournament? >> Team Allah
Opinions on me? >> You smell like a bag of doritos

It feels good to be one, hope to be a full moderator one day. I never expected for me to get accepted by a referral but.. I was fairly confident with my application the last two times applications opened and was confident in making it to the interview when the opened again.
What got you into PvP? How did you find Avicus? What made you stay? >> An 'OP' factions server. I found avicus by a IRL friend from school. Well the community is nice and sweet and I really like all the players on the staff team.
If you could get rid of two things in this world, what would they be? >> Racism & Donald Trump
How old are you? >> 14, turn 15  on 7/24.

Opinions on me? >> You smell like a bag of doritos

replies.body:
1. Is there something that happened to you that had no explanation?
Honestly, there probably was but I currently can't recall of anything.

  1. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
Probably 32 hours.

  1. Have you ever been stung by a bee?
Nope.

  1. What cheers you up?
Funny youtube videos.

  1. How do you start a conversation?
"Hey".

  1. What kind of music do you listen to?
Rap & Hip hop.

  1. What was your impression of me?
Pretty nice person.

  1. What's the best compliment you have received?
"Your eyes are so sexy."

Probably Supply (the original).
